verbose_text: Expression of a mouse HOIL-1L UBL (amino acids [aa] 1-140) in HOIL-1L null / null MEFs dramatically increased the amount of SHARPIN and HOIP (XREF_FIG) and protected cells against TNF-alpha-mediated cell death (XREF_FIG), implying that the UBL containing HOIL-N protein may efficiently form a functional trimeric LUBAC complex (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
